      Initializes javafx components, sets handlers, and adds nodes to the BorderPane
      Parameters:
      view - passes in View to communicate with global variables
      createOnBack - boolean to get the model if the back button was used to create this object

      Parameters:

    • mouseDragged

      public void mouseDragged​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Called when mouse is clicked and moving. Sets the current, sends coords to model, draws a line
      Parameters:
      e - mouse coordinates

    • mouseReleased

      public void mouseReleased​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Called when mouse released Closes shape and fills it with appropriate color in respect to soil
      Parameters:
      e - a button is clicked

    • undoButtonPressed

      public void undoButtonPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handler for the undo button Error handling for the case that nothing is drawn
      Parameters:
      event - a button is clicked

    • setColor

      public void setColor()
      Sets the parameter color to a Color depending on the soil in the drop down menu that is selected. Error handling for if there is no soil chosen.

    • undo

      public void undo​(java.util.HashMap<pkgController.Soil,​java.util.Stack<java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double>>> plots)
      Redraws the entire canvas with plots that has one fewer plot than it did previously. Draws grid, draws plots, draws the scale
      Parameters:
      plots - a data structure of points that make up plots

    • getCurrent

      public java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double getCurrent()
      Used for transferring user mouse data to the model
      Returns:
      the current mouse x and y

    • setCurrent

      public void setCurrent​(double x, double y)
      Sets the current point to a Point2D.Doble to be transferred to the model
      Parameters:
      x - coordinate of the mouse
      y - coordinate of the mouse

    • setDrawing

      public void setDrawing​(boolean drawing)
      Ensures canvas is clicked before drawing and sending data to the model
      Parameters:
      drawing - sets drawing to this

    • getDrawing

      public boolean getDrawing()
      Returns if the user is drawing or not
      Returns:
      current state of drawing

      Returns soil value in drop down menu

      public pkgController.Moisture getMoisture()
      Returns the amount of moisture in the slider
      Returns:
      the moisture value in the slider

    • getBudget

      public int getBudget()
      Returns the value in the budget entry box. If the value is not an integer, it returns 0, or else it returns the integer inside the box
      Returns:
      a 0 or integer entered in the budget entry box

    • errorPopup

      public void errorPopup​(java.lang.String error)
      Whenever called creates error pop up message
      Parameters:
      error - text to be displayed in a popup

    • buildPlots

      Builds the plots on coordinates
      Parameters:
      plots - a data structure containing all of the plots

    • incButtonPressed

      public void incButtonPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Calls scale with a positive 1 whenver the + button is pressed
      Parameters:
      e - the + button is pressed

    • decButtonPressed

      public void decButtonPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Calls scale with a negative 1 whenever the - button is pressed
      Parameters:
      e - the - button is pressed

    • scale

      public void scale​(double change)
      Changes current size of the canvas if its parent has changed Scales the points based off the model. Redraws the canvas
      Parameters:
      change - value to increase, decrease, or maintain the scale

    • resize

      public void resize()
      Updates the size of the canvas whenever its parent node is changed

    • getScale

      public double getScale()
      Returns:
      the minimum of the canvasHeight and the canvasWidth

    • getCanvasHeight

      public double getCanvasHeight()
      Returns:
      the current height of the canvas

    • getCanvasWidth

      public double getCanvasWidth()
      Returns:
      the current width of the canvas

    • resizeCanvas

      public void resizeCanvas()
      Takes the height and the width of the canvas after it resizes with the BorderPane. Sets the number of rows or columns based off the smaller of height and width and sets the larger of the two to a length relative to the number of rows or columns.

    • getRows

      public double getRows()
      Returns:
      the number of rows in the canvas

    • getColumns

      public double getColumns()
      Returns:
      the number of columns in the canvas

    • getMinGrid

      public double getMinGrid()
      Returns:
      whichever is smaller, rows or columns

    • setMinGrid

      public void setMinGrid()
      Sets minGrid to either rows or columns depedning on which is smaller

    • getMinLength

      public double getMinLength()
      Returns:
      the minimum length of height and width
